ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:08:50 [Issue ID 4000-133141] urn:comicvine:4000-133141 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-19 07:17:18. [Issue ID 133141]
ComicInfo.Summary: The J.U.D.G.E. agents have failed in their first mission and must now face the bizarre wrath of John Lawson, the fifth mutate. Chaos rules this issue of J.U.D.G.E. as our heroes are tortured by flying cats, dismembered, made into meat puppets, and kidnapped by Timmothy, a tattooed midget necrophiliac with a voice box. Don't miss the second blockbuster issue! Did we mention the beautiful art of Greg Horn?
ComicInfo.Title: Secret Rage Part 2
